name: Meloetta
flavorText:
Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization
method that can control the feelings of those who
hear it.
formDescription: Forms have different stats and types.  Meloetta changes form upon using relic song in battle, and reverts to Aria Forme outside of battle.

previous.name: Keldeo
previous.flavorText:
By blasting water from its hooves, it can
glide across water. It excels at using
leg moves while battling.
previous.formDescription: Forms only affect appearance.  In Black and White Versions 2, Keldeo becomes Resolute Form when it learns secret sword and reverts to Ordinary Form if it forgets that move.

next.name: Genesect
next.flavorText:
Over 300 million years ago, it was feared
as the strongest of hunters.
It has been modified by Team Plasma.
next.formDescription: Form changes to match Genesect's held Drive.  The only differences are the color of its weapon and techno blast's type.

method that can control the feelings of those who
hear it.
